word: GOD NEVER MAKES CLAIMS WITHOUT PROVIDING EVIDENCE, AND HE HAS ALWAYS SOUGHT TO HAVE A PEOPLE WHOSE LIVES WOULD DEMONSTRATE THE WISDOM OF HIS VALUES. SEVENTH-DAY ADVENTISTS BELIEVE THAT GOD HAS CALLED THEM TO LIVE THE MESSAGE THEY PREACH, AND SO DEMONSTRATE ITS EFFECTIVENESS FOR RENEWAL IN THIS LIFE. THE LIFE STYLES OF GOD'S REMNANT PEOPLE ARE TO ILLUSTRATE WHAT GOD WILL DO FOR ALL MEN AND WOMEN OF FAITH.
